de.mixedfx.eventbus

Class EventBusService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bushe.swing.event.ThreadSafeEventService
      • de.mixedfx.eventbus.EventBusService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bushe.swing.event.EventService

    public class EventBusService
extends org.bushe.swing.event.ThreadSafeEventService
     Individual EventBus
 - thread safe
 - synchronous and asynchronous
 - requires fixed structure if you use constructor(Class, int)

 For a generic EventBus use EventBus by bushe
